title: Darkside Wukong?
body: This would be a **sweet** skin for {{champion:62}}

replies.body:
I'd rather something like that for Yi... oh wait, we already do.

A Star Wars themed team would be great, Wukong, Yi, Fiora, anyone with a sword would be cool.

Maybe even a boba fett for an adc skin as well. if only lucas would let them.

Edit.. Or use Jango fett which would have to be lucian of course...
Jango and bobba are clones according to the prequels
Im not full into star wars. Just enjoy them. But if thats the case wouldn't that make them all clones of Jango? And i only say jango cause you see him without a mask.

According to the prequels and the animated series, the army of clones (aka storm troopers ) were all clones of jango fett, genetically modified so that they would follow orders without question.  The exception was bobba, who was an exact clone of jango with no mental manipulation.  

Force awakens has raised some questions about the nature of the storm troopers but that is my understanding of the lore according to the prequels.

WARNING!: STAR WARS 6 & 7 SPOILERS AHEAD!

The story goes that after the clone wars, the Empire took control of the cloning technology, creating their storm troopers. However, when the empire was defeated in Episode 6, the cloning facilities were lost to both the empire and the rebellion. First Order storm troopers are taken from their families at birth, and raised to be ruthless soldiers who knew nothing but the First Order and that the Rebellion is the enemy. However, they are still normal humans with free will. This is why there is a discrepancy between the two movies, and why Finn joins the rebellion in Episode 7.
As far as I'm concerned the force awakens isn't cannon
As far as I am concerned bacon doesn't come from a pig.
How would his Crushing Blow look though?
he holds in the middle, spins it once and sort of throws it a target
with the lore of yi and wukong, this would work well!

Not going to lie. I would break and buy RP for this...

Even though I don't play Wukong...

Of course I'm on board it's STAR WARS themed lol
Also how did you get it to add a pic, ever since the new board change I can't find any add an attachment option :/
